title: Markets Update: How COVID-19 Is and Isn't Like the '08 Financial Crisis
description: Joe Montesano, head of Americas Equity Trading for Goldman Sachs, analyzes how the coronavirus pandemic continues to add volatility to markets. Montesano also talks about parallels and differences in today's market environment compared to that of the 2008 global financial crisis.
itunes:author: Goldman Sachs
